alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 7:11PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Elko and north central Eureka Counties through 745 PM PDT... At 711 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Tuscarora, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuscarora and North Area Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
